description:
54" x 72"

95% Cotton (75% recycled) + 5% Polyester

Made in the USA.

Machine washable on cold, tumble dry on low, line dry, or dry flat.

Design preview colors are a simulated representation. Woven colors will naturally vary from what you see on the screen, but not by too much.

We try our best to deliver 1 week from time of purchase, however, please allow up to 2 weeks for domestic delivery and 3 weeks for international.

Sales on custom orders are final. No refunds or exchanges, except in the event that the item is defective or arrives damaged.
